intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) provides comprehensive documentation for the Riparian Zones Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) product within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Priority Area Monitoring component. It details the product's characteristics, methodology, and potential applications, focusing on the 2012 and 2018 reference years. The manual guides users through the product's structure, workflows, quality assessment, and technical specifications, enabling effective utilisation of the data for environmental monitoring and policy support within the EEA-38 + UK region.
